'''''Fulgura Frango''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VIII]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Millennial Pearl Seahorse]] while it is attempting to reconstruct a Xenomare Pearl.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the 1798 poem ''{{W|Song of the Bell}}'' by German poet {{w|Friedrich Schiller}}, which has the opening line written in Latin: {{Lang|mini=1|la=Vivos voco. Mortuos plango. Fulgura frango.|la_tl=I call the living, I mourn the dead, I repel lightning.}}
